con:request.name: Add News letter
con:request.con:request:
78840-02062016110336 Test Newsletters Welcome to our new newsletter

We hope you enjoy it!

con:config.script:
import org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils
String charset = (('A'..'Z') + ('0'..'9')).join() Integer length = 9 String randomString = RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray()) randomString = randomString + "@gmail.com" log.info randomString testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue( "email_id", randomString )

con:restRequest.name: AddNewsletter - Add News letter
con:restRequest.con:request:
${Properties#apiKey_Prop} Test Newsletters Welcome to our new newsletter

We hope you enjoy it!
